law.text:
The following definitions apply in this chapter unless the context otherwise requires:
"Litter" means rubbish, refuse, waste material, offal, paper, glass, cans, bottles, trash, debris or any foreign substance of whatever kind or description and whether or not it is of value.
"Noxious substance" means any substance capable of generating offensive, noxious or suffocating fumes, gases or vapors.
"Property" includes cattle.
law.history: Amended 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 3, effective July 13, 2004. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 406, sec. 105, effective January 1, 1975.
